allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 1: Infrastructure + Frontend

Frontend (MapLibre GL JS):
- Time slider with 1850-2025 range
- Temporal filtering by start_date/end_date
- Styled layers: buildings, roads, water, landuse
- Responsive design with mobile support
- PMTiles protocol integration

Data Pipeline Scripts:
- download_osm.sh: Fetch Trondheim from Overpass API
- generate_tiles.sh: Convert to PMTiles with tilemaker/planetiler
- Preserves temporal attributes for time filtering

Infrastructure:
- docker-compose.yml with nginx
- nginx.conf with PMTiles MIME types, CORS, compression
- validate_phase1.sh verification script

Documentation:
- README.md with setup instructions
- QUICKSTART.md for fast start
- Scripts documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 4: Real Data Integration

Kartverket Data Pipeline:
- download_kartverket.py: Fetch historical maps via Geonorge API
- georeference.py: Align maps with GDAL, GCP support, RMS quality
- tile_maps.py: Cut into ML-ready tiles with geo-coordinates

Annotation Tools:
- annotation_helper.py: Tkinter GUI for manual labeling
- annotation_progress.py: Track annotation statistics
- Keyboard shortcuts, brush tools, model prediction overlay

Fine-tuning & Extraction:
- fine_tune.py: Adapt model to real data (lower LR, encoder freezing)
- batch_extract.py: Process all tiles, vectorize to GeoJSON
- Temporal attributes (start_date, end_date) from map metadata

Validation:
- validate_phase4.sh: Comprehensive Phase 4 checks

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
